title: AssemblyPartRelationship
description: JSON Schema for Assembly Part Relationship in Catena-X Traceability (placeholder)

catenaXId.description: The unique Catena-X ID for this relationship

parentCatenaXId.description: The Catena-X ID of the parent/assembly part

childCatenaXId.description: The Catena-X ID of the child/component part

relationshipType.description: The type of relationship between parent and child

lifecycleContext.description: The lifecycle context for this relationship

quantityType.description: Specification of the quantity type (e.g., piece, weight, volume)

quantity.description: The quantity of the child part in the parent assembly

measurementUnit.description: The unit of measurement for the quantity (e.g., pc, kg, l)

validFrom.description: The date and time from which this relationship is valid

validTo.description: The date and time until which this relationship is valid (optional)
